data.text: @DavidJoffe64 @JonesHowdareyou @carly_solstice If you spent some time where I grew up (New Jersey), your tweet would seem like rainbows,unicorns, and cupcakes! Venting is good for your heart. :)
@itosettiMD_MBA @DavidJoffe64 @JonesHowdareyou @carly_solstice Sixty per cent positivity! Oh my, not a figure to be proud of.

@DavidJoffe64 @JonesHowdareyou @carly_solstice Don't apologise. Those with eyes to see & a functioning moral compass must speak the truth plainly. They may lose some friends for it, but there is no other way.
 I'm sorry to hear about your friend/ patient. Hope their recovery is swift. Take care yourself.
@EndemicPrepared @DavidJoffe64 @JonesHowdareyou @carly_solstice People are sick of masks. Covid not sick of people.   Yesterday 2000 people in US died of Covid. https://t.co/cQ3YR1VuE3

@DavidJoffe64 @JonesHowdareyou @carly_solstice Sorry to hear
These idiots politicians everywhere believe charlatans and think mass infecting everyone is a fantastic solution.
40% test positivity in Switzerland, 60% in the Netherlands.
5-10% in Italy, a country that has at least learnt sthg from early mistakes.

@DavidJoffe64 @JonesHowdareyou @carly_solstice I fully endorse the human experience & keeping it real. 

I'm sorry you've had such a 💩 day thanks to political decisions posing as public health
@DavidJoffe64 @JonesHowdareyou @carly_solstice It's just all friggin depressing. You have every right to vent. 😢🌹
